task.summary:
Gammamon impl. start. Following has changed:
- Refactored package structure reflecting another strategy type -winner - Refactored the MoveValidatorFactory to be a more general RulesFactory - Created WinnerStrategy interface and implemented the SimpleWinnerStrategy and validated the test suite is passing all tests

Gammamon impl. start. Following has changed:
- Refactored package structure reflecting another strategy type -winner - Refactored the MoveValidatorFactory to be a more general RulesFactory - Created WinnerStrategy interface and implemented the SimpleWinnerStrategy and validated the test suite is passing all tests
Fixed library include problem for Torben
refactored factory and added TestBetamonCustomBoard example

Gammamon impl. start. Following has changed:
- Refactored package structure reflecting another strategy type -winner - Refactored the MoveValidatorFactory to be a more general RulesFactory - Created WinnerStrategy interface and implemented the SimpleWinnerStrategy and validated the test suite is passing all tests
